name: ConvertKit Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 ConvertKit Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle ConvertKit events via webhooks

event.name: event
event.description: The events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 作用: The events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled | (必填项)

formId.name: formId
formId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
formId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

courseId.name: courseId
courseId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
courseId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sequence Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

link.name: link
link.description: The URL of the initiating link
link.natural_language_description: 参数名: Initiating Link | 作用: The URL of the initiating link | (必填项)

productId.name: productId
productId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Product ID | (必填项)

tagId.name: tagId
tagId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
tagId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)
